item.title: Mailserver
item.description: 尝试搭建邮件服务 搬运安装过程 Downloading and running Poste.io There are two versions of product, PRO and FREE image. PRO VERSION 1 poste.io/mailserver # (from https://poste.io docker server) FREE VERSION 1 analogic/poste.io # (from https://hub.docker.com) Both versions share same data directory structure - the only one difference when running PRO version is that you will login to our private docker repository.
